code: import moment from'moment';import{useCallback}from'react';import{useStore}from'effector-react';import{$appModel}from'../../Models/app';import localization from'moment/locale/uz-latn';export function useChangeDateLang(){var _useStore=useStore($appModel),lang=_useStore.$appLang;var accountLang=useCallback(function(){if(lang==='uz'){return'uz-latn';}else{return lang;}},[lang]);var changeDateLang=useCallback(function(date){return moment(date).locale(accountLang(),localization).startOf('minutes').fromNow();},[accountLang]);return{changeDateLang:changeDateLang};}
